text: He had more than 20 aliases and usually wore a mask. Sometimes he biked to avoid being identified via license plate. In the end, it was losing his temper at a rental car counter that led to the arrest of an elusive ATM skimming suspect, prosecutors say. https://t.co/4CVLtbnnyN
